## Sequential figure buildup

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.keep=c(2,4,5)}
plot(1:10, axes = FALSE, ty = "n", ylab = "", xlab = "x axis")
axis(1)

RcompileSlides::new_slide()
axis(2)
mtext("y axis", side = 2, line = par()$mgp[1])

RcompileSlides::new_slide()
points(1:10, 1:10, pch = 19)
```
